api_token.description: API authentication token used during API requests. You can generate API keys in the KPS cloud management console by using the Manage API Keys option.

host.description: Karbon Platform Services endpoint for hosting the Service Domain.

password.description: Password for the Karbon Platform Services local user account user.

username.description: Username for the Karbon Platform Services local user account user.

description.description: Description of the application. For example, describe the application's purpose.

edge_ids.description:
List of service domain and / or node IDs which are part of this application. 
				Even if you want to add a single ID, use square brackets. For example, [ '<svc domain id>' ]

helm_chart_filename.description: TGZ file name with path for the Helm chart for this application

helm_values_filename.description: Values yaml file name with path

name.description:
Name of the application:
				Name must include lowercase alphanumeric characters and must start and end with an lowercase alphanumeric character.
				Dash (-) and dot (.) characters are allowed as delimiters. Maximum length of 200 characters.

project_id.description: Id of the project to which this application belongs

block.description: Describes a Karbon Platform Services Kubernetes Application

description.description: Describe the node. For example, the main purpose or use case of the node.

gateway.description: Gateway IPv4 address for this node

is_bootstrap_master.description: Default setting is true. Set to false indicates this node is not a bootstrap master.

name.description:
Name of the node: 
				Name must include lowercase alphanumeric characters and must start and end with an lowercase alphanumeric character.
				Dash (-) and dot (.) characters are allowed as delimiters. Maximum length of 60 characters.

serial_number.description: Node serial number. Any alpha characters must be in all capitals.

service_domain_id.description: Id of the service domain to which this node belongs

wait_for_onboarding.description:
Default setting is false and the terraform provider does not wait for the node to be onboarded. 
				Set to true indicates that the terraform provider waits for the node to be onboarded.

block.description:
Set the role as master or worker. Default setting is true to enable the role as master as well as worker. 
				Set to false to disable a role.
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Service Domain Node. A Service Domain Node is the baremetal/virtual machine that is being managed by Karbon Platform Services.

description.description:
Describe the project. For example, the main purpose or use case of the project.
				Maximum length of 200 characters.

edge_ids.description:
List of service domain and / or node IDs which are part of this project. 
				Even if you want to add a single ID, use square brackets. For example, [ '<svc domain id>' ]

edge_selector_type.description:
Type for selecting nodes / service domains belonging to this project. 
				Valid values for this field are: 'Category' or 'Explicit'.
				Currently the terraform provider supports only Explicit mode.

name.description: Name of the project: Maximum length of 200 characters.

privileged.description:
Default setting is false. 
				Set to true indicates that the project can run with elevated privileges

role.description: Valid values for Role are: PROJECT_ADMIN, PROJECT_USER

user_id.description: ID of the user to be added to the project

block.description: List of users who can access this project
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Project.

name.description: Name of the Service Binding. Maximum length of 200 characters.

service_class_id.description:
Service class ID of the service you want to bind. 
				For example, ID of the AI Inferencing or the Istio service. 
				You can obtain service class IDs by querying the ServiceClass resource.

id.description: ID of the resource, either a service domain or a project

type.description: Valid values for this field are: 'SERVICEDOMAIN' or 'PROJECT'

block.description: The resource, service domain or project, to which the service class will be bound
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Service Binding.

description.description: Describe the service domain. For example, the main purpose or use case of the service domain.

last_updated.description: Last updated timestamp, auto-computed. No input required for this field.

name.description:
Name of the service domain: 
				Name must include lowercase alphanumeric characters and must start and end with an lowercase alphanumeric character.
				Dash (-) and dot (.) characters are allowed as delimiters. Maximum length of 60 characters.

virtual_ip.description: Virtual IPv4 address for this Service Domain

block.description: Describes a Karbon Platform Services Service Domain.

description.description:
Describe the service instance. For example, the main purpose or use case of the service instance.
				Maximum length of 200 charachters.

name.description: Name of the service instance: Maximum length of 200 characters.

project_id.description: ID of the project to which this service instance belongs.

service_class_id.description:
Service class ID of the service you want to bind.
				For example, ID of the AI Inferencing or the Istio service.
				You can obtain service class IDs by querying the ServiceClass resource.

block.description: Describes a Karbon Platform Services Service Instance.

is_default.description:
Default setting is true.
				Set to false indicates this storage profile is not the default profile for the service domain.

name.description: Name of the service instance: Maximum length of 200 characters.

service_domain_id.description: ID of the Service Domain to which this Storage Profile belongs.

type.description: Type of the Storage Profile, auto-computed. No input required for this field.

encrypted.description: Set to true if the data in the volume should be encrypted. By default this value is false.

iops_per_gb.description: Input / output operations per second, measured in GB

type.description: Type of the EBS volume. For example, gp2, gp3, io1, io2, st1, sc1

block.description: Configuration for the EBS type storage profile which uses the AWS EBS volumes as the backend storage for this profile.

data_services_ip.description:
IPv4 data services address used by Nutanix Volumes.
							Nutanix Volumes is a load-balanced iSCSI target storage feature of AOS.
							You can obtain this field value by logging in to the Nutanix Prism console.
							In the Prism web console, see Cluster Details to get the cluster data services IP address.

prism_element_cluster_vip.description:
This field sets a logical IP address for the cluster.
							You can obtain this field value by logging in to the Nutanix Prism console. 
							In the Prism web console, see Cluster Details to get the cluster virtual IP address.

prism_element_password.description:
Password for the Prism element cluster.
							You can obtain the credentials by contacting your Prism Element cluster administrator if you don't have them already.

prism_element_storage_container_name.description:
Name of the storage container: The maximum length is 75 characters.
							Allowed characters are uppercase and lowercase standard Latin letters (A-Z and a-z), Simplified Chinese, decimal digits (0-9), dots (.), hyphens (-), and underscores (_).

prism_element_username.description:
User name for the Prism element cluster.
							You can obtain the credentials by contacting your Prism Element cluster administrator if you don't have them already.

block.description: Configuration for the Nutanix AOS cluster storage which uses Nutanix Volumes as the backend storage for this profile.
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Storage Profile.
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Service Domain Node. A Service Domain Node is the baremetal/virtual machine that is being managed by Karbon Platform Services.
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Service Class.
Describes a Nutanix KPS Service Domain.
Describes a Karbon Platform Services User.
Describes a Karbon Platform Services Virtual Machine.
